name: fontawesome-autocomplete
description: Provides Font Awesome 5.3.1/4.7.0 CSS class names as autocompletion items for any language.

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.version.description: Font Awesome major version to use (either 4 or 5).

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.patterns.description: List of glob patters that determine which files will have Font Awesome Autocomplete enabled.

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.triggerWord.description: A word that triggers the auto completion of Font Awesome icons. Last character of the trigger word is also the trigger character for auto completion menu.

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.disableTriggerWo.description: A list of glob patterns for which the extension should NOT auto-remove the trigger word when a font class name is inserted from the auto completion list.

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.preview.backgrou.description: Background color of a Font Awesome icon preview. Supports any valid CSS color.

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.preview.foregrou.description: Foreground color of a Font Awesome icon preview. Supports any valid CSS color.

fontAwesomeAutocomplete.triggerCharacter.description: List of characters that trigger Font Awesome Autocomplete.
fontAwesomeAutocomplete.triggerCharacter.deprecationMessage: This setting is deprecated and replaced by triggerWord in version 1.0.4. This setting can be safely removed.
